bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Guide for Parameter Configuration of Arcing Horns of DC Earth Electrode Lines
IEEE Draft Guide for Parameter Configuration of Arcing Horns of DC Earth Electrode Lines

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Operating voltage, overvoltage and sustained DC arc current of DC earth electrode lines are introduced in this guide. Technical conditions of arcing horns are discussed, including gap spacing, structures, materials and layout. In addition, tests for arcing horns are recommended.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
